Build Companion

Dependencies

Following libs must be build to use Companion.

  • OpenCV - 3.X
  • CUDA (Only for CUDA build needed)

Build from sources

Simply use cmake or cmake-gui to build Companion for an specific platform. Enable the Cuda flag to build Companion with CUDA support by default CUDA support will not build.

git clone https://github.com/LibCompanion/libCompanion.git
cmake -DCompanion_USE_CUDA=ON/OFF
make
make install

Build with code examples

Examples are included as submodule or can be set in an cmake path.To build samples you must enable Companion_BUILD_SAMPLES flag.

Build Samples from Submodule

git submodule update --init --recursive
cmake -DCompanion_BUILD_SAMPLES=ON
make

Build Samples from Project

git clone https://github.com/LibCompanion/libCompanionSamples.git
cmake -DCompanion_BUILD_SAMPLES=ON -DCompanion_SAMPLE_MODULE=/path/to/libCompanionSamples/
make
